title: La Tentation de Saint Antoine
medium: unbound volume with a suite of 23 lithographs designed in 1896 and 15 in-text woodcuts by Georges Aubert after Redon, from blocks cut in 1896/1900, all on wove Arches paper
attribution: Odilon Redon, Georges Aubert after Redon, and Gustave Flaubert (author)
creditline: Woodner Collection, Gift of Dian Woodner
